title: Whats the name of this guy and what does he do

comments.body:

He used to teach for Information science and computer science students when I was in college (EC campus) from 2009-13. Being from the ECE branch never had the opportunity to be in his lectures. 

His name is Ajoy Kumar and always have this memory of him walking around with his earphones connected to an ipod. 

That's all we knew about him.
damn that description of him walking made me smile

Taught us Unix, barely the subject and a lot Life Gyan, most of which was offensive to people but is very practical in the real world.
No BS, a little stereotypical but really appreciate hard-working folks. An eye opening (if not offended) series of classes.
He's a phantom that appears only during the admission season then disappears without a trace.
